data.name: ProjectList
content:
This website was built in {{10 days}} using only HTML, CSS and JavaScript with {{React}}.
It is inspired by {{Arthur WallendorffðŸ”—https://github.com/zyriab}}'s web design which is based on terminal user interfaces (aka TUI). 
It is also {{completely responsive}}, with a quite distinct {{mobile}} and {{desktop}} UX.
I hope you {{enjoy}} your stay and {{come back}} soon! ;)

data.name: GEdit
content: {{GEDIT}} is a Graph Editor designed to simplify and {{enhance}} your graph data structuring and {{editing}} experience.

With intuitive features, it enables seamless {{creation}}, {{manipulation}}, and {{visualization}} of complex graphs, integrating essential elements like nodes and edges with versatile editing tools to provide a {{dynamic platform}} for graph-related tasks

data.name: PortFolio
content: A Portfolio created with {{Next.js}} and {{React.js}}. Leveraging Next.js SSR capabilities, it ensures {{lightning-fast}} load times and optional {{SEO}} performance

And {{Framer Motion.js}} brings smooth page transition effects and {{cool animations}} to life, enhancing the user experience with seamless {{interactivity}}. It perfectly complements the {{minimal design}} of the portfolio, providing {{dynamic}} visuals across multiple pages while maintaining a {{mobile responsive}} layout. This ensures a sleek, {{engaging}} experience on any device.

data.name: WaveSet
content:
{{WAVESET}} is a React-based project that leverages {{Wave Function Collapse}} to {{dynamically generate}} captivating patterns for a versatile tile set.
 I attempt the tiled model and explore a variety of solutions to the {{algorithm}} in JavaScript with React.js. and also explore React {{Context api}} and used useContext and useReducer hook

data.name: Schedula_check
content:
Schedula Check is a {{React-based}} website that allows users to compute available meeting times by comparing two people's schedules.
 Through this project, learners can gain hands-on experience in working with {{React hooks}} and {{effectively}} manage state and side effects in a real-world application.
